text: Nice place, good food, good food! Nothing special about this place other than being not one of those big breakfast chains.  I would have preferred some sort of a twist or better food. Value for money is good and the place is nice for family as well.

Super déjeuner, portions généreuses ce qui peut justifier des prix à peine plus élevé...  Difficile à trouver pour les nouveaux dans le coin, mais une fois identifié, on ne peut oublier.  Plafond ouvert ce qui peut rendre l'environnement un peu bruyant, mais rien de négatif.  Excellent service, rapide et courtois.

Was in the area and looking to eat. We saw a sign for the bistro but in reality it wasn't near where the bistro was nor did it say "in x building" or even an arrow. Find the bistro, people are seating themselves half hazardly. Take seats at the bar and be told by the staff that unless we take a table, we will not be served. Needless to say there wasn't a customer oriented wording to it; more of a couldn't care less attitude. Based on the number of customers seating randomly, and the reviews stating poor/slow service, there was a clear lack of organization so we left. Saying "have a great day" on our way out 30 seconds later with a smile doesn't take away from the attitude in your voice. Thanks for saving us the time of eating at your establishment.

Ambiance familial très chaleureux! Le service est réussi et la clientèle gentille. Le menu est pour le déjeuner et dîner  seulement. Les prix sont raisonnable et varie selon le choix du plat 7$-25$.  C'est une belle découverte dans le quartier ahuntsic au marché central de l'acadie. L'été il y a une terrasse et le parking est vaste et disponible.

Restaurant situé dans le marché central. Idéal pour les familles et les groupes peut accueillir un bon nombre de personnes. Les portions sont généreuses et j'ai été agréablement surprise par le goût de chaque plat servi. Prix également raisonnable. Le décor laisse quelque peu à désirer à mon avis, les toilettes sont souvent très sales ce qui fait pitié. Le service gagnerait à s'améliorer, on fait vite, bien sûr l'activité le week-end le nécessite mais un accueil plus courtois et chaleureux les aiderait :)

an absolute GEM! firstly, i've been living in this area for 7 years and had no idea it existed. secondly, it's a bit hard to find which would explain how it's such an awesome place because you can get good brunch without the long waits and the crowded space !! alright, my enthusiasm for the bistro may be clouded by the fact that we came on a saturday at noon and the place was only lightly filled. even mediocre brunch places have long waits on a saturday at noon. i had a croque au chicken and asparagus, my husband had a croque monsieur and our kids shared a ham and swiss cheese panini. it was all well prepared and good portions, our croques were very heavy on cheese but tbh, i'm not a croques-anything expert so i will have to eat elsewhere to compare. however, they have amazing fries, a good portion of salad and again, a very relaxing atmosphere that's not too busy. service is good. prices are standard. will absolutely be coming again.

I love this hidden little gem. Cute little bistro hidden in Marche Central right next to the movie theaters. Between Monday to Friday you can have this delicious bavette de steak for about 13$ during lunch time. Comes with garden salad, fries and the bavette of course. For a bit more you can make it into a trio but we didn't since the portions were more than enough.  Its not the first time i eat here and i keep coming back for the amazing service and freshness of their dishes.
